title: Why I Should be Unbanned
body: Today I got on for the first time and i played a blind pick game (the most casual game mode in league) and I had a varus as a teammate refer to me as “Toxic” 3 times and said I shouldn’t  speak because i wasn’t carrying. Im currently chat restricted for another false claim but thats another story, so i proceeded to stay calm and even help my team out and making plays and good calls. i went on to go 12/5/12 as Shaco and completely destroyed the opposing team. Later in post chat i had replied to varus saying “Who couldn’t carry” and that got me immedietly banned for 14 days, i believe we shouldn’t allow these very soft players ruin our gaming experience. Anybody can false report you and BAM just like that youre unable to play your favorite game for two whole weeks. In Call Of Duty your reports go straight to the trash and that forces you to grow up and understand that in any competive activity you will encounter trash talking and thats perfectly acceptable as long as no threats are made. Please Riot, grow a pair.

replies.body:
Have you considered, maybe, that "he started it" isn't a valid excuse?

I encourage you to post screenshots of your full unedited chat logs given in your reform card.

If you want a discussion if you deserve your ban or not, leave your chat-log.
Everything you have to say is irrelevant until then.

You don't get banned for people lying about what you said/did.

You get banned for attacking them back.

Seriously, if you stay cool and mute them? You're far more likely to get a tiltproof or two from your *other* teammates.

I think you might have some false perceptions about how the punishment system works. Maybe this will help:

https://imgur.com/tSp0yaq
before you post this you should read https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/eHGdgA3h-punished-heres-how-this-board-can-or-cant-help

Im permantly banned cause of a teammate i had saying stuff to me saying i was feeding was i was 2v1 bot lane cause my sup was trolling and the jg came bot lane camped it and rekt me and i got toxic and that person got me permantly banned and i just burst into tears i swear people just get so mad at you for no reason in this game if you do bad i seriously understand why people quit this game

yeah it happens all the time where someone takes it way too far and gets your account banned for no reason. im already looking into another game instead of league because these rules are gonna be its demise.
